game.name: Dungeon Grid
game.shortDescription: Dungeon Grid is a goofy top-down roguelike where you defeat hordes of enemies by customizing your wizard with unique synergistic parts and game-breaking combinations!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Dungeon Grid is a goofy top-down roguelike where you defeat hordes of enemies by customizing your wizard with unique synergistic parts and game-breaking combinations!
